name: Get Off My Planet
description:
Made in Unity for #1GAM (February 2016)

You're an alien living by yourself in your own planet. Suddenly, a fleet of weird flying vehicles from the planet Earth try to land on it. Your mission is to defend your planet from the earthling invaders.

For a better performance, it is advised to download and play the Windows version.

Authors:
Pedro Pereira (@pmhpereira)
Pedro Lucas (@ordepsacul)
